data.event: That number rose to 5,909 by 1910, and stood at 10,000 in 1940.
That number rose to 5,909 by 1910, and stood at 10,000 in 1940.
By 2000, the census showed a decline in population to 6,380.

event.title: was designated a financially distressed municipality in 2002

data.event: Greenville was designated a financially distressed municipality in 2002 by the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
